short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a new quote every day like a god

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the "Quote of the Day" extensionâ€”a delightful dose of daily inspiration wrapped in humor! Unleash your inner smile with a random quote that ranges from witty to wisdom, sure to brighten even the gloomiest days. Whether you're seeking a chuckle or a moment of reflection, this quirky Chrome extension delivers fresh, humorous, and thought-provoking quotes right at your fingertips. Dive into a treasure trove of quips and comedic gems that'll leave you grinning ear to ear. Say goodbye to mundane monotony and hello to your daily dose of laughter. Install now and let the giggles begin!
